form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION

full_text: Screened by, NARA, 5/9/2023 FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA 1962) Approved Bureau Budget APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA I- 492097 No. 47-R108.1 AND ALIEN REGISTRATION I, the undersigned, being duly sworn, state the following facts regarding myself and hereby make application for an IMMIGRANT VISA and ALIEN REGISTRATION under the Immigration and Nationality Act to the American Embassy Consul ars Section at San Salvador, El Salvador : 1. Family name Given name Initial 2. Place and date of birth Age RODAS Martha C. San Salvadr, El Salvador February 14, 1915 41 3. Other names by which I have been known 4. Last permanent residence Martha Calderon (maiden name) 4a. Ave. Sur No.19, Santa Ana El Salvador 5. Address in the United States 6. Name and address of person to whom destined, if any 1443 W. 53 St. Los Angeles, California Luz Calderon ("ister) 2 Same as No.5 7. Name and address of nearest relative in home country 8. Travel documents presented Passport No.034992 Olivia de Sisniegas (sister) Same as No. 4 Issued by Ministry Foreign Affairs of El Salvador on March 21, 1957 9. Hair 10. Eyes 11. Height 12. Weight 13. Nationality 15. Race 17. Sex 18. Marital status Salvadoran Span.American M Married Single black brown 5 1 100 14. Complexion 16. Ethnic Classification ft. in. lbs. medium Spanish F Widowed Divorced 19. Occupation 20. Distinguishing marks 21. Languages spoken, read, or written Office clerk none Spanish_01 22. Intended United States port of entry 23. Final destination 24. I have (a)X(ho) 25. Purpose of going to the United States through ticket to Direct to Los Angeles Los Angeles, Calif destination to reside 2:5 26. Places of previous residence none .2 27. Names and places of residence of spouse and minor children FOIA (b) (6) - travelling together 28. Name and address of father 29. Name and address of mother Joaquin Mariano Calderon - deceased Salome Dolores Castellanos - deceased 30. I claim to be a fnonquota immigrant and my claim is based on the 31. Available documents required by the Immigration and Nationality Act are preference quotaf filed herewith and made a part hereof, as follows (Sec. 222 (b)): following facts: I was born in El Salvador AFFIDAVITS OF SUPPORT: Birth, Medical, Husband's Police, Marriage and/Death certificates 32. I have never been: Arrested; convicted; in prison; in an almshouse; treated in an institution, hospital, or other place, for insanity or other mental disease; the beneficiary of a pardon or amnesty, except as hereinafter stated: Never 33. I have never applied to any American consular officer, either formally or informally, for a visa or other documentation as an immigrant or nonimmigrant, except as hereinafter stated: Never I 34. I have never been excluded, deported, or removed from the United States at Government expense, except as hereinafter stated: Never 16-67444-1 (Application continued on reverse side)
